About Me

Welcome! This is my personal website for my portfolio, projects, and blog. I coded this site with HTML and CSS, based on Jekyll and powered by GitHub Pages. Feel free to explore my personal and professional work above!

I am currently an undergraduate at the University of Virginia, pursuing a Distinguished Major in Human Biology and a B.A. in Mathematical Statistics.

My current career goal is to work in public health, with a particular interest in increasing equity and accessibility in healthcare and health information. Check out my ethics blog above!

I love music (a mix of classical and 90â€™s alt-rock), dancing (a mix of ballet and hip hop), and making jokes (a mix of bad and terrible).
